body.description: Old Spice GentleMan's Blend Aluminum Free deodorant was uniquely crafted to be gentle on skin. It has 5 odor fighting ingredients so you can feel confident that you're protected. It comes in Eucalyptus & Coconut Oil for a fresh scent that will impress others and confuse koalas, Lavender & Mint to keep your pits in mint condition, so you sell them later at market prices and Coffee & Amber because the coolest coffee shop in town has just relocated to your armpits. Also available in Body Wash.

Where can I find the ingredients of this men's deodorant? This Old Spice deodorant contains ingredients that are gentle on the skin. Complete list of ingredients is avaliable on the back of the product packaging. Is this deodorant gentle on the skin? Yes. This deodorant for men is formulated without aluminum. parabens, and dyes. Will this deodorant give me long-lasting odor protection? Yes, this mens deodorant will give you 24/7 odor protection with daily use. Does this product contain aluminum? No, this deodorant is aluminum-free. Gentleman's Blend Deodorant is also made without dyes, parabens, and phthalates.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Combats all stink!!
reviews.reviewText: Old Spice Men's Deodorant Aluminum Free in the Lavender & Mint scent is a refreshing and reliable choice for men seeking an effective deodorant without the presence of aluminum. As someone who values both performance and natural ingredients, I am pleased to share my positive experience with this product.First and foremost, the Lavender & Mint scent is invigorating and pleasing to the senses. It strikes the perfect balance between a subtle and refreshing fragrance, leaving you feeling clean and confident throughout the day. The combination of lavender's calming properties and the coolness of mint creates a unique and captivating aroma.One of the standout features of this deodorant is its aluminum-free formula. This is particularly appealing for those who prefer to avoid aluminum-based products or have sensitive skin. Despite being aluminum-free, this deodorant effectively neutralizes odor, keeping you feeling fresh and protected.The application process is smooth and effortless. The deodorant glides on easily, leaving no sticky residue or discomfort. Its quick-drying formula ensures there is no need to wait before getting dressed, saving valuable time during your morning routine.I am also impressed with the longevity of this deodorant's performance. It provides reliable odor protection throughout the day, even during physically demanding activities or in warmer environments. This is essential for maintaining confidence and feeling at ease in any situation.Moreover, Old Spice is a well-established brand known for its quality products, and this deodorant lives up to that reputation. The packaging is sleek and masculine, and the product itself is long-lasting, ensuring excellent value for money.In conclusion, Old Spice Men's Deodorant Aluminum Free in the Lavender & Mint scent is a top-notch choice for men seeking an aluminum-free deodorant with a refreshing fragrance. Its effective odor protection, pleasant scent, and smooth application make it a reliable option for daily use. If you're looking for a natural and dependable deodorant that keeps you feeling fresh all day long, I highly recommend giving this product a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Also Great For Ladies
reviews.reviewText: As a woman, I absolutely love this deodorant. Not only does it smell fresh and clean, it has no aluminum or parabens. I’ve tried all the female deodorants that are aluminum free and by far this one smells the best and keeps me feeling fresh all day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my boyfriend because he likes natural deodorants. He loves it and it smells sooooo good. Like a fresh and clean cologne scent that lasts all day. We’ve bought two scents and they both smell amazing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smells great, works great, too much plastic.
reviews.reviewText: Where has this stuff been all my life?I'm a big dude. I sweat a lot. I don't like anti-perspirants for a variety of reasons, and most of the 'all natural' stuff doesn't do much for me.This stuff works. For two days, if I'm busy and don't get a shower in. I primarily used their white-container scents previously (Fuji, Timber w/ Sandalwood, etc.) and they worked fine - but often struggled to go 18h without the stank coming on, and I'd not infrequently get skin irritation. This stuff far surpasses the performance, with less skin irritation.Everyone's body chemistry is different though - so if Old Spice worked best for you before, and you like the non-antiperspirant version of their white sticks, this will probably work great for you. If you've not tried it or that other stuff didn't work... I dunno. Try at your own risk.-1 star because it's still too much **** plastic that I throw away every time I finish a stick. Wish they had a recycling program or something that I could send stuff back to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Getting hard to find
reviews.reviewText: My husband only uses this deodorant. It has been the only one that he can use without breaking him out and making him uncomfortable and now it is getting hard to find. I was thankful to find these and grab them. He smells good throughout the day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for a great aluminum-free deodorant that smells great and have finally found it with this product! My whole family has transitioned to this product. The smell is amazing and not too overwhelming. It is smooth going on and doesnt leave any white residue. This is probably my most favorite deodorant I have ever bought!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Best smell and longest lasting I've ever used. Will continue to buy. Strong scent that would truly last 48 hours. Review is specifically for lavender scent. I tried vanilla, and it's 1/5.

reviews.reviewText: Don’t buy this overpriced and feminine scented product!
